main.name: Thomas Harrison
main.description: I am a Technology enthusiast who's usually too lazy to do anything after work, but decided to do this because why not? Used some other guy's template from GitHub and made the necessary changes because if we're being honest, I can't code my way out of a paper bag.
main.bio: Graduated UConn in 2016 and started working for Travelers in their Technology Leadership Developement Program (TLDP). Over the four years I spent in the program, I had rotations as a Scrum Master, Security Architect, Software Engineer, and DevOps Engineer/Product Owner. I am now in my current role of DevOps Engineer/Product Owner.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Busines - Management Information Systems
education.description: Pretty much a whole lot of binge drinking with friends and doing just enough work to pass with a B+ average.

work.title: Technology Leadership Development Program
work.description: Rotational Program that provided the opportunity to experience a breadth of roles. Also took part in internal committees responsible for recruiting and interviewing interns, Charity Fundraising through hosting a Golf Tournament, and Technology Education.
